name: part_011
file: tmp_【#大空スバル４周年】新衣装お披露目！！！！！４周年ありがとうございました！！！！！！！！：NEW 3D COSTUME !!! 4th anniversary Live【ホロライブ】 [n6yep2gl1HY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Subaru performs her original song 'Starlight' on stage with a space-themed background.
Subaru addresses the audience in an MC segment, reflecting on her four years in Hololive and introducing the final song.
Subaru performs a cover of 'Acacia' by BUMP OF CHICKEN as the grand finale of her 4th anniversary live.

subtitles.original: We can fly
subtitles.english: We can fly

subtitles.original: そう僕らは いつしか 夢の中 引かれて
subtitles.english: So before we knew it, we were drawn into a dream,

subtitles.original: ただがむしゃらに 走り続けたよ
subtitles.english: and just kept running recklessly.

subtitles.original: 無限の宇宙に 響いた
subtitles.english: The voice that echoed through the infinite universe

subtitles.original: 君を照らす声は
subtitles.english: to shine on you,

subtitles.original: どこへだって きらり 飛んでいけるんだ
subtitles.english: it can fly sparkly anywhere.

subtitles.original: 愉快な仲間と歩いた非日常
subtitles.english: An extraordinary life I walked with my cheerful friends.

subtitles.original: 掴んでみて指先の 一等星
subtitles.english: Try to grab the first-magnitude star at your fingertips.

subtitles.original: 滲んでゆく目の前に広がった限界は
subtitles.english: The limits that spread out before my eyes and began to blur,

subtitles.original: 皆の手重ねてぶっ壊して
subtitles.english: were smashed by all of our hands overlapping.

subtitles.original: 吸い込まれそうな夜空を見上げて
subtitles.english: Looking up at the night sky that seems to suck me in,

subtitles.original: 今叫ぶよ スターライト
subtitles.english: I'll shout it now: Starlight!

subtitles.original: I wanna be
subtitles.english: I wanna be

subtitles.original: そう僕らは いつでも 側で笑い合って
subtitles.english: so we'll always laugh together by each other's side,

subtitles.original: あふれる声が 遠くこだまする
subtitles.english: our overflowing voices echoing far away.

subtitles.original: 願いのかけらを灯した 君の腕を引いて
subtitles.english: Pulling your arm as you light up the fragments of your wishes,

subtitles.original: どこへだって きらり 飛んでいけるんだ
subtitles.english: we can fly sparkly anywhere.

subtitles.original: ちょこっと不安な日も 魔法をかけてハッピー
subtitles.english: Even on slightly uneasy days, cast a spell and be happy.

subtitles.original: 百人力で乗り越えていこう
subtitles.english: Let's overcome it with the strength of a hundred people.

subtitles.original: アクアブルーに染まる 大空にめがけた
subtitles.english: Aiming for the vast sky dyed in aqua blue,

subtitles.original: 鼓動が弾んでく
subtitles.english: my heart is pounding.

subtitles.original: We can fly
subtitles.english: We can fly

subtitles.original: そう僕らは この日を ずっと待ってたんだ
subtitles.english: so we've been waiting for this day for a long time.

subtitles.original: まだ覚めないで
subtitles.english: Please don't wake up yet.

subtitles.original: Starlight
subtitles.english: Starlight

subtitles.original: 僕らは 止まらない その光が消える
subtitles.english: We won't stop until that light fades out,

subtitles.original: 一秒前まで 走り続けるよ
subtitles.english: we'll keep running until the second before then.

subtitles.original: 無限の宇宙に 響いた 君を照らす声を
subtitles.english: The voice that echoed through the infinite universe to shine on you,

subtitles.original: 強く抱いて きらり 輝いてゆけ
subtitles.english: hold it tight and go on shining sparkly.

subtitles.original: 次は、最後の曲になります。
subtitles.english: The next song will be the last one.

subtitles.original: この4年間スバルは、みんなとここまで歩いてこれて、とっても幸せでした！
subtitles.english: Subaru was very happy to have been able to walk this far with everyone over the past four years!

subtitles.original: これからもずっと歩いていこうと思うので、応援よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: I'm planning to keep walking forever, so please continue to support me!

subtitles.original: それでは聴いてください。最後の曲は、アカシア。
subtitles.english: Now, please listen. The last song is 'Acacia'.

subtitles.original: 透明よりも綺麗な あの輝きを 確かめに行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go and see that radiance, even clearer than transparency.

subtitles.original: そうやって始まったんだよ たまに忘れるほど強い理由
subtitles.english: That's how it started. A reason so strong I sometimes forget it.

subtitles.original: 冷たい雨に濡れる時は 足音比べ 騒ぎながら行こう
subtitles.english: When we get wet in the cold rain, let's compare our footsteps and make some noise as we go.

subtitles.original: 太陽の代わりに唄を 君と僕と世界の声で
subtitles.english: Let's have a song instead of the sun, with your voice, mine, and the voice of the world.

subtitles.original: いつか君を見つけた時に 君に僕も見つけてもらったんだな
subtitles.english: When I found you one day, you found me too, didn't you?

subtitles.original: 今 目が合えば笑うだけさ 言葉の外側で
subtitles.english: Now, if our eyes meet, we'll just laugh, beyond words.

subtitles.original: ゴールはきっとまだだけど もう死ぬまでいたい場所にいる
subtitles.english: The goal is surely still ahead, but I'm already in the place where I want to stay until I die.

subtitles.original: 隣で 君の側で 魂がここだよって叫ぶ
subtitles.english: Beside you, by your side, my soul shouts that it's here.

subtitles.original: 泣いたり笑ったりする時 君の命が揺れる時
subtitles.english: When we cry or laugh, when your life flickers,

subtitles.original: 誰より近くで 特等席で 僕も同じように 息をしていたい
subtitles.english: closer than anyone else, in a special seat, I want to be breathing just like you.

subtitles.original: 君の一歩は僕より遠い 間違いなく君の凄いところ
subtitles.english: Your step is further than mine, that's definitely a great thing about you.

subtitles.original: 足跡は僕の方が多い 間違いなく僕の凄いところ
subtitles.english: I have more footprints, that's definitely a great thing about me.

subtitles.original: 真っ暗闇が怖い時は 怖
subtitles.english: When I'm afraid of the pitch-black darkness, I'm a-
